description: pendant in simplified fish profile; blunted lip, concave curved body, sloping tail; very small perforation at lower lip; incision to indicate fins and the most general features, both sides indentical; mottled grey translucent jade, partially calcified; traces of red pigment, almost identical with 50.46.254
medium: Mottled yellow-grey jade with traces of red pigment
title: Pendant in the Form of a Fish
